text: The Satin Slipper (Le soulier de satin) is a 1985 French Portuguese German Swiss drama movie directed by Manoel de Oliveira and based on the play of the same name by Paul Claudel. It stars Isabelle Weingarten, Lu√≠s Miguel Cintra, Patricia Barzyk, Anne Consigny, Bernard Alane, Jean-Pierre Bernard. ==Other websites== * Category:1985 drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Portuguese movies Category:German drama movies Category:Swiss drama movies Category:Movies directed by Manoel de Oliveira
title: The Satin Slipper
